channel.title: Hlp pls
channel.description:
how do you make it so if you click a emote it teles you somewhere. [example] if you click laugh it teles you to where you set it to.
shouldnt be that hard but something i never learned. pls tell me

item.title: Hlp pls
item.dc:creator: @treston323 treston323
item.description:
@treston323 wrote:

case 170: //crystal
if(emotes == 0)
{
teleportToX = 2914;
teleportToY = 3450;
}
else
{
emotes = 0;
pEmote = playerSE;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;
what is appearanceUpdateRequired = true
??

there was only 1 laugh and i changed it to crystal didnt work
what i do if someone knows

Read full topic

item.title: Hlp pls
item.dc:creator: @Lilium Lilium
item.description:
@Lilium wrote:

ok darling…

what you need to do is open ‘client.java’ and search this:

case 170: // laugh emote

you should see something similiar to this:

case 170: // laugh emote startAnimation(0x35D); break;
replace that line with this:

case 170: // laugh emote teleportToX = <XCOORDS>; teleportToY = <YCOORDS>; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

: x-coordinate of your location
: y-coordinate of your location

Read full topic
